newsitem.title: UK: Newcastle Utd to detail float plans Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Newcastle Utd to detail float plans Thursday.

text.p: English premier league soccer club Newcastle United confirmed on Wednesday that it would announce details of its planned flotation on Thursday.
Press officer Graham Courtney said the club would issue a statement on the flotation on Thursday.
Newcastle said last month that it would release details of the transaction in mid-January ahead of a spring listing on the London Stock Exchange.
The shock resignation of manager Kevin Keegan last week risked disrupting the timetable but it was put back on track by the appointment of Kenny Dalglish 24 hours ago.
